data.title: Great burgers and fries.
data.text: This place had delicious burger and fries.  The portion sizes are large, so come when you are hungry!

data.title: Fantastic burger
data.text: Fantastic burgers to be had at Moonsoon burgers. Milkshakes are heavenly. We enjoy adding our own fresh toppings to our orders. Friendly staff. Restaurant always clean.

data.title: Best Burger
data.text: This place makes the best burgers. Period. The fries are really good too.  Their milkshakes are to die for.  Stop counting calories for a minute.  Just go enjoy.

data.title: Nothing to write home about
data.text: Overly priced run of the mill burger. Had heard great things about the burgers, but on a scale of 1-10, I give it 3.

data.title: Watch your burger on the merry-go-round!
data.text: This burger joint has a unique grilling technique as your burger patty revolves over the heat source as it cooks. Great selection of condiments and accoutrements for your tastes. Very nice people who are there to please you. Get your burger on.

data.title: Delicious Lunch
data.text: I love how great the food at Monsoon Burger is. The setting has an industrial vibe and it is pretty clean too. The staff is nice. Great place to have lunch.

data.title: Great burger!
data.text: Great burger selection and fries, yummy and very filling shakes!  Only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is that I find their chairs very uncomfortable...but it's still not enough to deter me from enjoying an amazing burger!!

data.title: Good Burgers
data.text: Visited with family from SoCal after a Jelly Belly tour. Children and adults got what they wanted, and everybody was happy. Service was a little slow, but not awful. Burgers and fries were tasty, and the kids were happy. I would stop by again when I am in the neighborhood.

data.title: Huge amount of food!!!
data.text: I tried this restaurant based on the reviews here on trip advisor. These burgers are MASSIVE, your choice of 6 or 8 oz patties. Served on buttered, toasted buns, these burgers are cooked to order. Both my husband and I ordered med-well burgers but they were well done which didn't impact flavour, just texture. The burgers are seasoned simply and not overpowering like some burger places (garlic etc). They're served with enough fries for 2...FYI. If we came here again my husband and I might opt to share an 8oz burger and fries!

data.title: Great food, dirty restaurant
data.text:
We were searching for a burger place in Fairfield and this place was at the top of the list. Based on the great ratings we thought we would try it out.  It is off the beaten path, but as far as quality of food it is excellent. 

There were 3 of us in our party and we each ordered burgers and fries.  I was highly impressed with the great customer service,  food taste and quality of the meat used in the burgers. Great food, fresh veggies to top it off along with condiments. 
I had noticed while we were sitting at the table there was a dried spilled drink on the floor between us and the counter. After ordering our food I went to use the restroom. I was surprised at how gross the toilets were. Not only that, my daughter used the stall next to me. While going to use the trash receptacle she saw a used IV rig in it. Ok so there are things you can overlook, but the last item is unacceptable. I did not get told by my daughter until after we left. 
Adding to that,  when we went to empty our trays at the garbage. There was dried, like overnight or at least a day old, ketchup, mustard and other stuff on the rim of the trash. So my opinion and assumption is (since they only had been open about 35-40 minutes) is that the night crew had not cleaned the place very well. Possibly shorthanded? I don't know, but was borderline unacceptable.  The cleanliness issue totally turned me off from this business.

data.title: Don't know why I hadn't tried before
data.text: I was so impressed. I had the chicken breast burger and fries. The service was great and the fries were just right.

data.title: Can't-Miss Local Burgers
data.text:
Monsoon Burger was one of the first places we visited upon moving to Fairfield, on the advice of locals (they never steer you wrong!). Named for its circular grill, Monsoon offers beef and turkey burgers as well as chicken sandwiches and a WIDE variety of other delicious items. This local spot is also unique in that you're served your burger on a bun and add your own condiments to your preference. I love that! Combine a delicious burger with hot, crispy fries in this low-key gem and you won't go wrong.

Expect decent-sized crowds during the standard lunch and dinner rushes, but it's definitely worth the wait. 

If you're into easy-going burger joints that serve delicious food with a chill vibe, check out Monsoon Burger!!

data.title: Always an excellent burger!
data.text: You you would like a fresh grilled burger, then this is your place. It's also a great place to support a local business that is not a chain.  The owner is always pleasant and very customer service oriented. Also, try is homemade potato salad. It is different from any you have tried. It is whipped and amazing! There also is a good variety of the type of burgers available in addition to chicken. Great shakes too if you're in the mood for one of them. Consistently good. If you haven't been there, it's time.

data.title: great food
data.text: We've eaten at Monsoon many times and it is always delicious. They cook each sandwich to order and it is hot and fresh when you get it. You can order online and it's ready when you arrive.

data.title: Great burger, lots of options!
data.text: I love this place.  You have so many options from type of burger, chicken, veggie, etc. and you get to dress it yourself.  They have all the toppings and the onion rings are so good.  It gets busy on the week days at lunch, because of its close proximity to downtown and I notice a lot of military people come here for lunch as well.  So get there in advance of noon or order ahead.  The staff is always friendly and the facility is kept clean.

data.title: Excellent burgers.
data.text: I have eaten there on a variety of occasions. When my mother-in-law comes to town she asks to go to Monsoon Burger.

data.title: Made to order and very fresh
data.text:
While visiting my son at Travis AFB, I opted to try this out as it's nearby.  It was a Sunday early evening and only a few tables were taken.  I ordered a Mushroom-Swisscheese burger (you get your choice of cheese), and regular fries and a pint of local craft beer from Sacramento.  My son had the Monsoon burger which was heavily on the guacamole.  Both burgers were grilled to perfection.  

You get the choice of 6oz or 8oz burger.  You also get a choice of type of fries, onion rings or carrot sticks, and there are fresh slices of tomatoes and lettuce off the side to pick yourself.  One can also have chicken or turkey burgers.

You make your order and you pick up your food from the counter.   There are several TVs on the wall which show sports.  Tables are spread widely apart so you're not crowded in during a busy spell.  The building is located at a corner of a busy street, but it wasn't loud inside.  

It's a nice place for a burger joint; I'd go there again.

data.title: Lunch
data.text: I tried the namesake burger, obviously their specialty and loved every bite!  ¹/² lbs burger with bacon, sauteed mushrooms, cheese (I choose cheddar), and guacamole.  Excellent quality and enough toppings to ensure you get full flavor in every bite.  They have a do it yourself toppings bar which was very fresh, I added red onions and a little mayo to my burger to perfect it.  Would definitely come again when I find myself in downtown Fairfield.

data.title: You just can't beat this burger. No wonder it is #1 in town.
data.text: We were in the mood for a burger, and read about this one on TripAdvisor. We were not disappointed. The burgers are cooked to order, and are grilled, not fried. The Monsoon Burger was truly a treat. It was done perfectly and tasted terrific. And I have never been to a burger place where you chose  your own condiments, and could help yourself to as much as you wanted. The restaurant is very clean and there is plenty of parking.We will be back.

data.title: Amazing burger
data.text:
Last night in the states, had to try one of the best burger joints in the area. Expectations where exceeded. Ordered a 8oz cheeseburger and some onion rings. Both where the best I've tasted in a long time. Choosing your own condiments might seem a bit strange... But that way you can really fine tune the perfect burger. 
The meat was excellent quality exactly grilled to my needs. Excellent cook.

Would recommend this to anyone in the area
